mapper.sql: SELECT wwcla.work_order_id, wwcla.work_order_number, wwob.PLANNED_START_QUANTITY, isnull(wwob.COMPLETED_QUANTITY,0) as COMPLETED_QUANTITY, wwca.transaction_quantity as work_transaction_quantity, wwcla.organization_id, wwcla.item_number, wwcla.inventory_item_id, wwcla.quantity_per_product, wwcla.erp_flag, wwcla.erp_flag_date, wwcla.remark, wwcla.last_update_date, wwcla.wie_line_id, wwcla.uom_code, (case when pica.item_work_name_flag = 4 then '3FCKL001' ELSE wwcla.subinventory_code end) as subinventory_code, wwcla.transaction_quantity, isnull(iopn.quantity,0) as onhand_quantity, (case when isnull(iopn.quantity,0) >= wwcla.transaction_quantity then 0 ELSE wwcla.transaction_quantity - isnull(iopn.quantity,0) end) as chayi_quantity, wwcla.error_infor, wwdv.REQUIRED_QUANTITY, wwdv.ISSUED_QUANTITY, isnull((SELECT SUM (msta.QUANTITY) AS TRANSFER_QUANTITY FROM mes_subinventory_transfer_all msta WHERE msta.work_order_id IS NOT NULL AND msta.ERP_FLAG = 1 AND msta.work_order_id = wwcla.work_order_id AND msta.FROM_ORGANIZATION_ID = wwcla.organization_id AND msta.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = wwcla.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND msta.TRANSFER_SUBINVENTORY_CODE = wwcla.subinventory_code GROUP BY msta.work_order_id, msta.FROM_ORGANIZATION_ID, msta.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID),0) as transfer_quantity, isnull(qichu.transaction_quantity,0) as qichu_quantity, (case when wwdv.BASIS_TYPE = '1' then '变动' when wwdv.BASIS_TYPE = '2' then '固定' ELSE null end) as BASIS_TYPE, (CASE WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 1 THEN '贴片' WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 2 THEN '插件' WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 3 THEN '装配' WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 4 THEN '辅料' WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 5 THEN 'SMT' WHEN pica.item_work_name_flag = 6 THEN 'DIP' ELSE NULL END) AS item_work_name, isnull(sumWie.transaction_quantity,0) as suohao_quantity FROM mes_wie_wo_complete_all wwca, sync_wie_work_orders_b wwob, sync_wie_wo_demand_v wwdv, mes_wie_wo_complete_lines_all wwcla LEFT JOIN sync_inv_onhand_quantity_new_code iopn ON (wwcla.organization_id = iopn.ORGANIZATION_ID AND wwcla.inventory_item_id = iopn.inventory_item_id AND wwcla.subinventory_code = iopn.subinventory_code) LEFT JOIN pes_erp_wie_work_material_qichu_all qichu ON (wwcla.work_order_id = qichu.transaction_source_id AND wwcla.organization_id = qichu.organization_id AND wwcla.inventory_item_id = qichu.inventory_item_id) LEFT JOIN pes_item_techniques_code_all pica ON (wwcla.organization_id = pica.organization_id AND wwcla.inventory_item_id = pica.inventory_item_id) LEFT JOIN (SELECT mwma.work_order_id, mwma.inventory_item_id, mwma.ORGANIZATION_ID, SUM (mwma.transaction_quantity) AS transaction_quantity FROM mes_work_material_all mwma GROUP BY mwma.work_order_id, mwma.inventory_item_id, mwma.ORGANIZATION_ID) sumWie on (wwcla.ORGANIZATION_ID = sumWie.ORGANIZATION_ID and wwcla.work_order_id = sumWie.work_order_id and wwcla.inventory_item_id = sumWie.inventory_item_id)
